page.title: 10FARMING
page.content: MUSHROOM FARMING IS VERY POPULAR IN OUR PARISH.THERE ARE MAINLY SMALLER MUSHROOM CONCERNS WITHIN OUR GRID AREA. THESE FARMERS HAVE CONTRACTS WITH LARGER MUSHROOM GROWERS AND EXPORTERS WHO SUPPLY THE MARKETS HERE AND ABROAD. MUSHROOM GROWING IS HAZARDOUS AS WELL AS DIFFICULT AND HEAVY WORK.NO TWO DAYS ARE THE SAME ON A MUSHROOM FARM.THE COMPOST IS BROUGHT TO A TEMPERATURE OF 140C IN THE PEAK HEATING HOUSE.THE MUSHROOM SPAWN HAS TO BE SPRINKLED ON AND MIXED WITH THE COMPOST.THIS IS THEN LEFT IN IN A VERY WARM DARK ATMOSPHERE FOR ABOUT 14 DAYS, THEN THE MIXTURE OF PEAT AND LIME ARE SPRINKLED ON TOP ---THIS PROCESS IS KNOWN AS CASING THEN THIS IS LEFT IN BOXES IN THE CROPING HOUSE FOR A FURTHER THREE WEEK
